card.name: Evil Eye
card.description: {{KW:TURBO}}: Reveal a random card in the opponent's hand. {{KW:MAGIC}}: Deal 1 {{DMG}}. If it killed a monster, heal 2 {{HP}} to you.

description.now: {{KW:TURBO}}: Reveal a random card in the opponent's hand. {{KW:MAGIC}}: Deal 1 {{DMG}}. If it killed a monster, heal 2 {{HP}} to you.
description.prev: {{KW:TURBO}}: Reveal a random card from your opponent's hand. {{KW:MAGIC}}: Raise the {{COST}} of a random card in your opponent's hand by 2.
